[冎]
Pictogram ( 象形 ): bones. [ 1 ] Original form of 骨 ( OC *kuːd ).
It also appears as the top component of 咼 , which has a distinguishing 口 added. See also its variant 另 and the top component of the simplified character 呙 (< 咼 ).

[剮]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *kroːlʔ ): phonetic 咼 ( OC *kʰʷroːl ) + semantic 刀 ( “ knife ” ) .

[剐]
Unorthodox variant of 剮 . Simplified from 剮 ( 咼 → 呙 )
